name: unshapely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having an attractive shape or form: They thought that skinny and unshapely legs were not as sexy as curvy legs. She wore unshapely denims. Opposite
shapely
More examplesFewer examplesPilates was billed as exercise that could change an unshapely lump into a lithe goddess without the need to raise a sweat.All of the trousers just seemed to hang, and the skirts looked unshapely.His hands were thin and unshapely - they resembled birds' claws.This smallish tree tends to be rather unshapely even after being cut back hard.
